name: Suave Professionals Natural Infusion Softening Body Wash, 12 fl oz

reviews.name: Suave Professionals Natural Infusion Softening Body Wash, 12 fl oz
reviews.reviewText: Decided to try this after recently trying out the professionals shampoo and having good results. This body wash smells like an expensive body wash and the scent is long lasting! Also made my skin a little smoother
reviews.title: Love the smell!

reviews.name: Suave Professionals Natural Infusion Softening Body Wash, 12 fl oz
reviews.reviewText: Love the smell and the way it left me feeling soft.
reviews.title: great feeling

reviews.name: Suave Professionals Natural Infusion Softening Body Wash, 12 fl oz
reviews.reviewText:
Suave Professionals Body Wash - Oooooh my good heavens!!!! I just discovered my all time favorite body wash. Seriously, I wish they made a body lotion with this fragrance as well. It's inexpensive and the best smelling body wash - All the money I've spent on the brand names and here this little spa like smell is to die for!!! L*O*V*E
PS: Oh and did I mention, I'm super picky about smell!!!!!
reviews.title: Oh my good heaven's - this is to die for!!!!!!!!

reviews.name: Suave Professionals Natural Infusion Softening Body Wash, 12 fl oz
reviews.reviewText: Got a free sample & LOVED IT!!! Want to buy more!!
reviews.title: LOVE this Body wash, SADDEN can't buy local :-(

reviews.name: Suave Professionals Natural Infusion Softening Body Wash, 12 fl oz
reviews.reviewText: I LOVED the way the shampoo and conditioner smelled so I was absolutely thrilled to see that you made a body wash. I am hoping that you make a body lotion with the awapuhi scent soon.
reviews.title: SMELLS GREAT!!!!
